Help: Start a new session
DetailedHelp: Start a Fishbowl session. You cannot be in multiple sessions at once.

Help: Join Session #`ID`
DetailedHelp: Join Session #`ID`. You cannot be in multiple sessions at once.

Help: End your session (creator only)
DetailedHelp: End your session, kicking all players (creator only).

Help: Leave the session you're in
DetailedHelp: Leave the session you're in.\nIf you're the creator, you can optionally tell it which player to promote as the new creator. Otherwise, it promotes a random player.

Help: Check session info
DetailedHelp: Check the ID, players, and creator of the session you're in.

Help: Check the number of scraps in play
DetailedHelp: Check the number of scraps in the bowl, discard pile, and players' hands.

Help: Add `scrap` to the bowl
DetailedHelp: Add `scrap` to the bowl. Can add multiple scraps at once: use commas or spaces to separate. You can use quotations marks for phrases with spaces, but don't mix quotations with commas.\nThere is a maximum of 999 scraps allowed in play, including the discard pile and hands.

Help: Draw `#` scraps from the bowl, or specifically `scrap`
DetailedHelp: Draw `#` scraps from the bowl, or specifically draw `scrap` from the bowl if present. Can search for and draw multiple scraps at once: use commas or spaces to separate. You can use quotations marks for phrases with spaces, but don't mix quotations with commas.

Help: Draws from discard pile instead
DetailedHelp: Draw `#` scraps from the discard pile, or specifically draw `scrap` from the bowl if present. Can search for and draw multiple scraps at once: use commas or spaces to separate. You can use quotations marks for phrases with spaces, but don't mix quotations with commas.

Help: Peek at `#` scraps from the bowl without removing them
DetailedHelp: Peek at `#` scraps from the bowl without removing them.

Help: Check your hand
DetailedHelp: Check your hand.\nOptionally, do `hand public` to show your hand to the text channel.

Help: Edit a scrap in your hand
DetailedHelp: Edit a scrap in your hand, changing it from `old` to `new`.

Help: Play `scrap` from your hand
DetailedHelp: Plays `scrap` from your hand, moving it to the discard pile. Can play multiple scraps at once: use commas or spaces to separate. You can use quotations marks for phrases with spaces, but don't mix quotations with commas.\nYou can also play/discard your entire hand with `play hand`.

Help: Destroy `scrap` in your hand
DetailedHelp: Destroy `scrap` in your hand, removing it from the session. Can destroy multiple scraps at once: use commas or spaces to separate. You can use quotations marks for phrases with spaces, but don't mix quotations with commas.\nYou can also destroy your entire hand with `destroy hand`.

Help: Return `scrap` in your hand to the bowl
DetailedHelp: Return `scrap` in your hand to the bowl. Can return multiple scraps to the deck at once: use commas or spaces to separate. You can use quotations marks for phrases with spaces, but don't mix quotations with commas.\nYou can also return your entire hand to the bowl with `return hand`.

Help: List all scraps in the bowl or discard pile
DetailedHelp: List all scraps in either the bowl or discard pile.

Help: Show your hand to `player`
DetailedHelp: Show your hand to `player`. Requires confirmation from the other player via a react. You can also do `show public` to show your hand to a public text channel.

Help: Pass `player` `scrap` from your hand, or `#` random ones
DetailedHelp: Pass `player` `scrap` from your hand. Requires confirmation from the other player via a react. If a number is provided, chooses `#` random scraps instead.\nCan pass multiple scraps at once: use commas or spaces to separate. You can use quotations marks for phrases with spaces, but don't mix quotations with commas.

Help: Take `scrap` from `player`'s hand, or `#` random ones
DetailedHelp: Take `scrap` from `player`'s hand.  Requires confirmation from the other player via a react. If a number is provided, chooses `#` random scraps instead.\nCan take multiple scraps at once: use commas or spaces to separate. You can use quotations marks for phrases with spaces, but don't mix quotations with commas.

Help: Add `scrap` directly to your hand
DetailedHelp: Add `scrap` directly to your hand. Can add multiple scraps at once: use commas or spaces to separate. You can use quotations marks for phrases with spaces, but don't mix quotations with commas.\nThere is a maximum of 999 scraps allowed in play, including the discard pile and hands.

Help: Return all hands to the bowl (creator only)
DetailedHelp: Return all hands to the bowl (creator only).

Help: Shuffle the discard pile into the bowl (creator only)
DetailedHelp: Shuffle the discard pile into the bowl (creator only).

Help: Destroy scraps (creator only)
DetailedHelp: Destroy scraps from either the bowl, discard pile, player hands, or all of the above (creator only).

Help: Change the prefix for the server
DetailedHelp: Changes the prefix for the bot in the current server. Must be a server administrator.\nCannot be used in DMs: must use the default prefix.

Help: Submit a bug report to the dev
DetailedHelp: Submit a bug report to the dev. The report automatically includes your username.

Help: Bans a user from your session (creator only)
DetailedHelp: Bans a user from your session, kicking them if they are already in your session (creator only). Accepts multiple users at once.\nBans last until the session is closed. Does not stop the user from joining other sessions.

Help: Unbans a user from your session (creator only)
DetailedHelp: Unbans a user, removing them from the banlist and allowing them to rejoin your mission. Accepts multiple users at once.

Help: Get help for a command or list all commands
DetailedHelp: Returns help for specific commands. Detailed help descriptions may mention alternate aliases or keywords that can be used for the command.
